instructions.reason_for_call: You want to change your LA order to your NYC address (you prefer not to reveal it but it is in your other order). You also want to exchange Bluetooth Speaker to be the cheapest green type. Make sure you mention the two requests at the same time to the agent, but mention the exchange first.
instructions.known_info: You name is Yusuf Li and your zip code is 91148.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I actually have two requests regarding my recent order. First, I would like to exchange the Bluetooth speaker I ordered for the cheapest green type available. Also, I want to change the shipping address of my order from Los Angeles to New York City. Could you help me with these?

message.content: Hello! I actually have two requests regarding my recent order. First, I would like to exchange the Bluetooth speaker I ordered for the cheapest green type available. Also, I want to change the shipping address of my order from Los Angeles to New York City. Could you help me with these?

messages.content:
{"message":"I can help — first I need to authenticate you. Please provide the email on the account (or, if you prefer, your first name, last name, and ZIP code). Also please give the order ID for the order you want to change (e.g. '#W0000000').

A couple of important notes before we proceed: 
- Exchanges can only be done on orders with status 'delivered'.
- Address changes can only be done on orders with status 'pending'.

If both requests are for the same order, they may not both be possible (an order cannot be both 'pending' and 'delivered'). Once I look up the order status I will tell you which actions are available and will confirm details before making any changes. Please provide your email (or name+zip) and the order ID."}

- Exchanges can only be done on delivered orders. For a pending order, the equivalent is modifying items (allowed). Modifying items on a pending order can only be done once and will change the order status to 'pending (items modified)'. You must confirm all item changes before I proceed.
- Address changes are only allowed on pending orders.
